popularityCurve.label: i've never done any favors for anybody lobbyist or special-interest group that's a clear 24-year record

clusterList.phrase: i've never done any favors for anybody lobbyist or special-interest group that's a clear 24-year record
now listen not every lobbyist is bad i mean some of them they're just trying to present their point of view
the poor don't have a lobbyist that's why i went to washington
i'm very much a populist look after people the people need a lobbyist and that's what i plan to do bring common sense to u s senate

i work with lobbyists and folks in pacs all the time in virginia and they're not bad but i think there's a sense sometimes in washington that they kinda have a veto power over policy initiatives it's not a matter of having a seat at the table they should often they have great expertise but sometimes you feel like government is what lobbyists allow to happen rather than what a president or congress decide to focus on as key policies
i think we have a rule that says lobbyists can't be on the floor
i was a bit surprised certainly former speakers and members enjoy a certain status but not all are lobbyists
